nodes.text: Polmanar was a planet located in the Anoat sector of the galaxy. At the time of the Galactic Empire's Iron Blockade of the sector, Polmanar was a base of the Trade Spine League.
When Leeka Pali of the Trade Spine League suspected double-dealings from one of their own, she covertly sent a young smuggler to the planet to see if her suspicions had any merit.

Polmanar was first mentioned in The Isis Coordinates, a Star Wars Legends roleplaying game written by Christopher Kubasik and released in 1990. The world was later canonized by the 2015 mobile game Star Wars: Uprising, in which Polmanar is mentioned in a Crew Run entitled "Deception from Within."
